upload_id.name: upload_id
upload_id.description: The persistent and globally unique identifier for the upload of the entry

upload_create_time.name: upload_create_time
upload_create_time.description: The date and time when the upload was created in nomad

entry_id.name: entry_id
entry_id.description: A persistent and globally unique identifier for the entry

entry_name.name: entry_name
entry_name.description: A brief human readable name for the entry.

entry_name.prefix.name: entry_name
entry_name.prefix.description: A brief human readable name for the entry.

entry_type.name: entry_type
entry_type.description: The main schema definition. This is the name of the section used for data.

entry_create_time.name: entry_create_time
entry_create_time.description: The date and time when the entry was created in nomad

parser_name.name: parser_name
parser_name.description: The NOMAD parser used for the last processing

mainfile.name: mainfile
mainfile.description: The path to the mainfile from the root directory of the uploaded files

mainfile.path.name: mainfile
mainfile.path.description: The path to the mainfile from the root directory of the uploaded files

mainfile_key.name: mainfile_key
mainfile_key.description:
Key used to differentiate between different *child entries* of an entry.
For parent entries and entries that do not have any children, the value should
be empty.

mainfile_key.path.name: mainfile_key
mainfile_key.path.description:
Key used to differentiate between different *child entries* of an entry.
For parent entries and entries that do not have any children, the value should
be empty.

files.name: files
files.description:
The paths to the files within the upload that belong to this entry.
All files within the same directory as the entry's mainfile are considered the
auxiliary files that belong to the entry.

files.path.name: files
files.path.description:
The paths to the files within the upload that belong to this entry.
All files within the same directory as the entry's mainfile are considered the
auxiliary files that belong to the entry.

pid.name: pid
pid.description:
The unique, sequentially enumerated, integer PID that was used in the legacy
NOMAD CoE. It allows to resolve URLs of the old NOMAD CoE Repository.

raw_id.name: raw_id
raw_id.description:
The code specific identifier extracted from the entry's raw files by the parser,
if supported.

external_id.name: external_id
external_id.description:
A user provided external id. Usually the id for an entry in an external database
where the data was imported from.

published.name: published
published.description: Indicates if the entry is published

publish_time.name: publish_time
publish_time.description: The date and time when the upload was published in nomad

with_embargo.name: with_embargo
with_embargo.description: Indicated if this entry is under an embargo

processed.name: processed
processed.description: Indicates that the entry is successfully processed.

last_processing_time.name: last_processing_time
last_processing_time.description: The date and time of the last processing.

nomad_version.name: nomad_version
nomad_version.description: The NOMAD version used for the last processing

nomad_commit.name: nomad_commit
nomad_commit.description: The NOMAD commit used for the last processing

comment.name: comment
comment.description: A user provided comment for this entry

references.name: references
references.description: User provided references (URLs) for this entry

external_db.name: external_db
external_db.description: The repository or external database where the original data resides

origin.name: origin
origin.description:
A short human readable description of the entries origin. Usually it is the
handle of an external database/repository or the name of the main author.

main_author.name: main_author
main_author.description: The main author of the entry

viewers.name: viewers
viewers.description: All viewers (main author, upload coauthors, and reviewers)

datasets.dataset_id.name: dataset_id
datasets.dataset_id.description:
The unique identifier for this dataset as a string. It should be
a randomly generated UUID, similar to other nomad ids.

datasets.dataset_name.name: dataset_name
datasets.dataset_name.description:
The human-readable name of the dataset as string. The dataset name must be
unique for the user.

datasets.doi.name: doi
datasets.doi.description:
The optional Document Object Identifier (DOI) associated with this dataset.
Nomad can register DOIs that link back to the respective representation of
the dataset in the nomad UI. This quantity holds the string representation of
this DOI. There is only one per dataset. The DOI is just the DOI name, not its
full URL, e.g. "10.17172/nomad/2019.10.29-1".

datasets.dataset_create_time.name: dataset_create_time
datasets.dataset_create_time.description: The date when the dataset was first created.

datasets.dataset_modified_time.name: dataset_modified_time
datasets.dataset_modified_time.description:
The date when the dataset was last modified. An owned dataset
can only be extended after a DOI was assigned. A foreign dataset cannot be changed
once a DOI was assigned.

datasets.dataset_type.name: dataset_type
datasets.dataset_type.description:
The type determined if a dataset is owned, i.e. was created by
the authors of the contained entries; or if a dataset is foreign,
i.e. it was created by someone not necessarily related to the entries.

datasets.name: datasets
datasets.description: A list of user curated datasets this entry belongs to.

n_quantities.name: n_quantities
n_quantities.description: Number of metainfo quantities parsed from the entry.

quantities.name: quantities
quantities.description: All quantities that are used by this entry.

quantities.path.name: quantities
quantities.path.description: All quantities that are used by this entry.

sections.name: sections
sections.description: All sections that are present in this entry. This field is deprecated and will be removed.

optimade.elements.name: elements
optimade.elements.description: Names of the different elements present in the structure.

optimade.nelements.name: nelements
optimade.nelements.description: Number of different elements in the structure as an integer.

optimade.elements_ratios.name: elements_ratios
optimade.elements_ratios.description: Relative proportions of different elements in the structure.

optimade.chemical_formula_descriptive.name: chemical_formula_descriptive
optimade.chemical_formula_descriptive.description:
The chemical formula for a structure as a string in a form chosen by the API
implementation.

optimade.chemical_formula_reduced.name: chemical_formula_reduced
optimade.chemical_formula_reduced.description:
The reduced chemical formula for a structure as a string with element symbols and
integer chemical proportion numbers. The proportion number MUST be omitted if it is 1.

optimade.chemical_formula_hill.name: chemical_formula_hill
optimade.chemical_formula_hill.description:
The chemical formula for a structure in Hill form with element symbols followed by
integer chemical proportion numbers. The proportion number MUST be omitted if it is 1.

optimade.chemical_formula_anonymous.name: chemical_formula_anonymous
optimade.chemical_formula_anonymous.description:
The anonymous formula is the chemical_formula_reduced, but where the elements are
instead first ordered by their chemical proportion number, and then, in order left to
right, replaced by anonymous symbols A, B, C, ..., Z, Aa, Ba, ..., Za, Ab, Bb, ... and
so on.

optimade.nperiodic_dimensions.name: nperiodic_dimensions
optimade.nperiodic_dimensions.description:
An integer specifying the number of periodic dimensions in the structure, equivalent
to the number of non-zero entries in dimension_types.

optimade.nsites.name: nsites
optimade.nsites.description: An integer specifying the length of the cartesian_site_positions property.

optimade.species_at_sites.name: species_at_sites
optimade.species_at_sites.description:
Name of the species at each site (where values for sites are specified with the same
order of the cartesian_site_positions property). The properties of the species are
found in the species property.

optimade.structure_features.name: structure_features
optimade.structure_features.description:
A list of strings that flag which special features are used by the structure.

- disorder: This flag MUST be present if any one entry in the species list has a
chemical_symbols list that is longer than 1 element.
- unknown_positions: This flag MUST be present if at least one component of the
cartesian_site_positions list of lists has value null.
- assemblies: This flag MUST be present if the assemblies list is present.

section_defs.definition_qualified_name.name: definition_qualified_name
section_defs.definition_qualified_name.description: The qualified name of the compatible section.

section_defs.definition_id.name: definition_id
section_defs.definition_id.description: The definition id of the compatible section.

section_defs.used_directly.name: used_directly
section_defs.used_directly.description: If the compatible section is directly used as base section.

entry_references.target_reference.name: target_reference
entry_references.target_reference.description: The full url like reference of the the target.

entry_references.target_entry_id.name: target_entry_id
entry_references.target_entry_id.description: The id of the entry containing the target.

entry_references.target_name.name: target_name
entry_references.target_name.description: The name of the target quantity/section.

entry_references.target_path.name: target_path
entry_references.target_path.description: The path of the target quantity/section in its archive.

entry_references.source_name.name: source_name
entry_references.source_name.description: The name of the source (self) quantity/section in its archive.

entry_references.source_path.name: source_path
entry_references.source_path.description: The path of the source (self) quantity/section in its archive.

entry_references.source_quantity.name: source_quantity
entry_references.source_quantity.description: A reference to the quantity definition that defines the reference

searchable_quantities.quantity_name.name: quantity_name
searchable_quantities.quantity_name.description: The name of the quantity holding the value.

searchable_quantities.section_definition.name: section_definition
searchable_quantities.section_definition.description: A reference to the section definition for the section that holds the quantity that holds the value.

searchable_quantities.path.name: path
searchable_quantities.path.description: The path to the quantity holding the value.

searchable_quantities.keyword_value.name: keyword_value
searchable_quantities.keyword_value.description: The value mapped as an ES keyword field.

searchable_quantities.text_value.name: text_value
searchable_quantities.text_value.description: The value mapped as an ES text field.

searchable_quantities.long_value.name: long_value
searchable_quantities.long_value.description: The value mapped as an ES long number field.

searchable_quantities.double_value.name: double_value
searchable_quantities.double_value.description: The value mapped as an ES double number field.

searchable_quantities.date_value.name: date_value
searchable_quantities.date_value.description: The value mapped as an ES date field.

results.material.material_id.name: material_id
results.material.material_id.description:
A fixed length, unique material identifier in the form of a hash
digest.

results.material.material_name.name: material_name
results.material.material_name.description: Meaningful names for this a material if any can be assigned.

results.material.functional_type.name: functional_type
results.material.functional_type.description: Classification based on the functional properties.

results.material.compound_type.name: compound_type
results.material.compound_type.description: Classification based on the chemical formula.

results.material.elements.name: elements
results.material.elements.description: Names of the different elements present in the structure.

results.material.n_elements.name: n_elements
results.material.n_elements.description: Number of different elements in the structure as an integer.

results.material.elements_exclusive.name: elements_exclusive
results.material.elements_exclusive.description:
String containing the chemical elements in alphabetical order and
separated by a single whitespace. This quantity can be used for
exclusive element searches where you want to find entries/materials
with only certain given elements.

results.material.chemical_formula_descri.name: chemical_formula_descriptive
results.material.chemical_formula_descri.description:
The chemical formula for a structure as a string in a form chosen by the API
implementation.

results.material.chemical_formula_reduce.name: chemical_formula_reduced
results.material.chemical_formula_reduce.description:
The reduced chemical formula for a structure as a string with element symbols and
integer chemical proportion numbers. The proportion number MUST be omitted if it is 1.

results.material.chemical_formula_hill.name: chemical_formula_hill
results.material.chemical_formula_hill.description:
The chemical formula for a structure in Hill form with element symbols followed by
integer chemical proportion numbers. The proportion number MUST be omitted if it is 1.

results.material.chemical_formula_anonym.name: chemical_formula_anonymous
results.material.chemical_formula_anonym.description:
The anonymous formula is the chemical_formula_reduced, but where the elements are
instead first ordered by their chemical proportion number, and then, in order left to
right, replaced by anonymous symbols A, B, C, ..., Z, Aa, Ba, ..., Za, Ab, Bb, ... and
so on.

results.material.chemical_formula_reduce.name: chemical_formula_reduced_fragments
results.material.chemical_formula_reduce.description:
The reduced formula separated into individual terms containing both the atom
type and count. Used for searching parts of a formula.

results.material.symmetry.bravais_lattic.name: bravais_lattice
results.material.symmetry.bravais_lattic.description:
Identifier for the Bravais lattice in Pearson notation. The first lowercase letter
identifies the crystal family and can be one of the following: a (triclinic), b
(monoclinic), o (orthorhombic), t (tetragonal), h (hexagonal) or c (cubic). The
second uppercase letter identifies the centring and can be one of the following: P
(primitive), S (face centred), I (body centred), R (rhombohedral centring) or F
(all faces centred).

results.material.symmetry.hall_number.name: hall_number
results.material.symmetry.hall_number.description: The Hall number for this system.

results.material.symmetry.hall_symbol.name: hall_symbol
results.material.symmetry.hall_symbol.description: The Hall symbol for this system.

results.material.symmetry.point_group.name: point_group
results.material.symmetry.point_group.description: Symbol of the crystallographic point group in the Hermann-Mauguin notation.

results.material.symmetry.space_group_nu.name: space_group_number
results.material.symmetry.space_group_nu.description:
Specifies the International Union of Crystallography (IUC) number of the 3D space
group of this system.

results.material.symmetry.space_group_sy.name: space_group_symbol
results.material.symmetry.space_group_sy.description:
The International Union of Crystallography (IUC) short symbol of the 3D
space group of this system.

results.material.symmetry.prototype_form.name: prototype_formula
results.material.symmetry.prototype_form.description: The formula of the prototypical material for this structure.

results.material.symmetry.prototype_aflo.name: prototype_aflow_id
results.material.symmetry.prototype_aflo.description:
The identifier of this structure in the AFLOW encyclopedia of
crystallographic prototypes:
http://www.aflowlib.org/prototype-encyclopedia/index.html

results.material.symmetry.structure_name.name: structure_name
results.material.symmetry.structure_name.description: A common name for this structure, e.g. fcc, bcc.

results.material.symmetry.strukturberich.name: strukturbericht_designation
results.material.symmetry.strukturberich.description:
Classification of the material according to the historically grown
'strukturbericht'.

results.material.topology.system_id.name: system_id
results.material.topology.system_id.description:
That path of this section within the metainfo that is used as a unique
identifier.

results.material.topology.label.name: label
results.material.topology.label.description: Descriptive label that identifies this structural part.

results.material.topology.method.name: method
results.material.topology.method.description: The method used for identifying this system.

results.material.topology.description.name: description
results.material.topology.description.description: A short description about this part of the topology.

results.material.topology.material_id.name: material_id
results.material.topology.material_id.description:
A fixed length, unique material identifier in the form of a hash
digest.

results.material.topology.material_name.name: material_name
results.material.topology.material_name.description: Meaningful names for this a material if any can be assigned.

results.material.topology.structural_typ.name: structural_type
results.material.topology.structural_typ.description: The structural classification for this system.

results.material.topology.functional_typ.name: functional_type
results.material.topology.functional_typ.description: Classification based on the functional properties.

results.material.topology.compound_type.name: compound_type
results.material.topology.compound_type.description: Classification based on the chemical formula.

results.material.topology.elements.name: elements
results.material.topology.elements.description: Names of the different elements present in the structure.

results.material.topology.n_elements.name: n_elements
results.material.topology.n_elements.description: Number of different elements in the structure as an integer.

results.material.topology.elements_exclu.name: elements_exclusive
results.material.topology.elements_exclu.description:
String containing the chemical elements in alphabetical order and
separated by a single whitespace. This quantity can be used for
exclusive element searches where you want to find entries/materials
with only certain given elements.

results.material.topology.formula_hill.name: formula_hill
results.material.topology.formula_hill.description:
The chemical formula for a structure in Hill form with element symbols followed by
integer chemical proportion numbers. The proportion number MUST be omitted if it is 1.

results.material.topology.formula_reduce.name: formula_reduced
results.material.topology.formula_reduce.description:
The reduced chemical formula for a structure as a string with element symbols and
integer chemical proportion numbers. The proportion number MUST be omitted if it is 1.

results.material.topology.formula_anonym.name: formula_anonymous
results.material.topology.formula_anonym.description:
The anonymous formula is the chemical_formula_reduced, but where the elements are
instead first ordered by their chemical proportion number, and then, in order left to
right, replaced by anonymous symbols A, B, C, ..., Z, Aa, Ba, ..., Za, Ab, Bb, ... and
so on.

results.material.topology.formula_reduce.name: formula_reduced_fragments
results.material.topology.formula_reduce.description:
The reduced formula separated into individual terms containing both the atom
type and count. Used for searching parts of a formula.

results.material.topology.n_atoms.name: n_atoms
results.material.topology.n_atoms.description: The total number of species (atoms, particles) in the system.

results.material.topology.atoms.nperiodi.name: nperiodic_dimensions
results.material.topology.atoms.nperiodi.description:
An integer specifying the number of periodic dimensions in the
structure, equivalent to the number of non-zero entries in
dimension_types.

results.material.topology.atoms.n_sites.name: n_sites
results.material.topology.atoms.n_sites.description: An integer specifying the length of the cartesian_site_positions property.

results.material.topology.atoms.lattice_.name: a
results.material.topology.atoms.lattice_.description: Length of the first basis vector.

results.material.topology.atoms.lattice_.name: b
results.material.topology.atoms.lattice_.description: Length of the second basis vector.

results.material.topology.atoms.lattice_.name: c
results.material.topology.atoms.lattice_.description: Length of the third basis vector.

results.material.topology.atoms.lattice_.name: alpha
results.material.topology.atoms.lattice_.description: Angle between second and third basis vector.

results.material.topology.atoms.lattice_.name: beta
results.material.topology.atoms.lattice_.description: Angle between first and third basis vector.

results.material.topology.atoms.lattice_.name: gamma
results.material.topology.atoms.lattice_.description: Angle between first and second basis vector.

results.material.topology.cell.a.name: a
results.material.topology.cell.a.description: Length of the first basis vector.

results.material.topology.cell.b.name: b
results.material.topology.cell.b.description: Length of the second basis vector.

results.material.topology.cell.c.name: c
results.material.topology.cell.c.description: Length of the third basis vector.

results.material.topology.cell.alpha.name: alpha
results.material.topology.cell.alpha.description: Angle between second and third basis vector.

results.material.topology.cell.beta.name: beta
results.material.topology.cell.beta.description: Angle between first and third basis vector.

results.material.topology.cell.gamma.name: gamma
results.material.topology.cell.gamma.description: Angle between first and second basis vector.

results.material.topology.symmetry.brava.name: bravais_lattice
results.material.topology.symmetry.brava.description:
Identifier for the Bravais lattice in Pearson notation. The first lowercase letter
identifies the crystal family and can be one of the following: a (triclinic), b
(monoclinic), o (orthorhombic), t (tetragonal), h (hexagonal) or c (cubic). The
second uppercase letter identifies the centring and can be one of the following: P
(primitive), S (face centred), I (body centred), R (rhombohedral centring) or F
(all faces centred).

results.material.topology.symmetry.hall_.name: hall_number
results.material.topology.symmetry.hall_.description: The Hall number for this system.

results.material.topology.symmetry.hall_.name: hall_symbol
results.material.topology.symmetry.hall_.description: The Hall symbol for this system.

results.material.topology.symmetry.point.name: point_group
results.material.topology.symmetry.point.description: Symbol of the crystallographic point group in the Hermann-Mauguin notation.

results.material.topology.symmetry.space.name: space_group_number
results.material.topology.symmetry.space.description:
Specifies the International Union of Crystallography (IUC) number of the 3D space
group of this system.

results.material.topology.symmetry.space.name: space_group_symbol
results.material.topology.symmetry.space.description:
The International Union of Crystallography (IUC) short symbol of the 3D
space group of this system.

results.material.topology.symmetry.struk.name: strukturbericht_designation
results.material.topology.symmetry.struk.description:
Classification of the material according to the historically grown
'strukturbericht'.

results.material.topology.prototype.aflo.name: aflow_id
results.material.topology.prototype.aflo.description:
AFLOW id of the prototype (see
http://aflowlib.org/CrystalDatabase/prototype_index.html) identified on the basis
of the space_group and normalized_wyckoff.

results.material.topology.prototype.name.name: name
results.material.topology.prototype.name.description: A common name for this prototypical structure, e.g. fcc, bcc.

results.material.topology.prototype.form.name: formula
results.material.topology.prototype.form.description: The formula of the prototypical material for this structure.

results.method.method_id.name: method_id
results.method.method_id.description:
Identifier for the used method. Only available for a subset of entries
for which the methodology has been identified with precision.

results.method.method_name.name: method_name
results.method.method_name.description: Common name for the used method.

results.method.simulation.program_name.name: program_name
results.method.simulation.program_name.description: The name of the used program.

results.method.simulation.program_versio.name: program_version
results.method.simulation.program_versio.description: The version of the used program.

results.method.simulation.dft.core_elect.name: core_electron_treatment
results.method.simulation.dft.core_elect.description: How the core electrons are described.

results.method.simulation.dft.scf_thresh.name: scf_threshold_energy_change
results.method.simulation.dft.scf_thresh.description:
Specifies the threshold for the total energy change between two subsequent
self-consistent field (SCF) iterations. The SCF is considered converged when the
total-energy change between two SCF cycles is below the threshold (possibly in
combination with other criteria).

results.method.simulation.dft.van_der_Wa.name: van_der_Waals_method
results.method.simulation.dft.van_der_Wa.description: The used van der Waals method.

results.method.simulation.dft.relativity.name: relativity_method
results.method.simulation.dft.relativity.description:
Describes the relativistic treatment used for the calculation of the final energy
and related quantities. If skipped or empty, no relativistic treatment is applied.

results.method.simulation.dft.smearing_k.name: smearing_kind
results.method.simulation.dft.smearing_k.description:
Specifies the kind of smearing on the electron occupation used to calculate the
free energy (see energy_free)

Valid values are:

| Smearing kind             | Description                       |

| ------------------------- | --------------------------------- |

| `"empty"`                 | No smearing is applied            |

| `"gaussian"`              | Gaussian smearing                 |

| `"fermi"`                 | Fermi smearing                    |

| `"marzari-vanderbilt"`    | Marzari-Vanderbilt smearing       |

| `"methfessel-paxton"`     | Methfessel-Paxton smearing        |

| `"tetrahedra"`            | Interpolation of state energies and occupations
(ignores smearing_width) |

results.method.simulation.dft.smearing_w.name: smearing_width
results.method.simulation.dft.smearing_w.description:
Specifies the width of the smearing in energy for the electron occupation used to
calculate the free energy (see energy_free).

*NOTE:* Not all methods specified in smearing_kind uses this value.

results.method.simulation.dft.xc_functio.name: xc_functional_type
results.method.simulation.dft.xc_functio.description: The libXC based xc functional classification used in the simulation.

results.method.simulation.dft.xc_functio.name: xc_functional_names
results.method.simulation.dft.xc_functio.description: The list of libXC functional names that where used in this entry.

results.method.simulation.dft.exact_exch.name: exact_exchange_mixing_factor
results.method.simulation.dft.exact_exch.description: Amount of exact exchange mixed in with the XC functional (value range = [0,1]).

results.method.simulation.dft.hubbard_mo.name: u_effective
results.method.simulation.dft.hubbard_mo.description: Value of the effective U parameter (U-J).

results.method.simulation.dft.hubbard_mo.name: u
results.method.simulation.dft.hubbard_mo.description: Value of the on-site Coulomb interaction U

results.method.simulation.dft.hubbard_mo.name: j
results.method.simulation.dft.hubbard_mo.description: Value of the exchange interaction J

results.method.simulation.projection.loc.name: localization_type
results.method.simulation.projection.loc.description: Projection method type for the virtual (Wannier) orbitals.

results.method.simulation.gw.type.name: type
results.method.simulation.gw.type.description:
GW Hedin's self-consistency cycle:

| Name      | Description                      | Reference             |

| --------- | -------------------------------- | --------------------- |

| `"G0W0"`  | single-shot                      | -                     |

| `"scGW"`  | self-consistent GW               | PRB 88, 075105 (2013) |

| `"scGW0"` | self-consistent G with fixed W0  | PRB 54, 8411 (1996)   |

| `"scG0W"` | self-consistent W with fixed G0  | -                     |

| `"ev-scGW"`  | eigenvalues self-consistent GW   | PRB 34, 5390 (1986)   |

| `"qp-scGW"`  | quasiparticle self-consistent GW | PRL 96, 226402 (2006) |

results.method.simulation.gw.starting_po.name: starting_point_type
results.method.simulation.gw.starting_po.description: The libXC based xc functional classification used in the starting point DFT simulation.

results.method.simulation.gw.starting_po.name: starting_point_names
results.method.simulation.gw.starting_po.description: The list of libXC functional names that where used in this entry.

results.properties.n_calculations.name: n_calculations
results.properties.n_calculations.description: The number of performed single configuration calculations.'

results.properties.available_properties.name: available_properties
results.properties.available_properties.description: Subset of the property names that are present in this entry.

results.properties.structural.radial_dis.name: type
results.properties.structural.radial_dis.description: Describes if the observable is calculated at the molecular or atomic level.

results.properties.structural.radial_dis.name: label
results.properties.structural.radial_dis.description: Describes the group of atoms/molecule/groups of molecules involved in determining the property.

results.properties.structural.radial_dis.name: time_step
results.properties.structural.radial_dis.description: The timestep at which the numerical integration is performed.

results.properties.structural.radial_dis.name: ensemble_type
results.properties.structural.radial_dis.description:
The type of thermodynamic ensemble that was simulated.

Allowed values are:

| Thermodynamic Ensemble          | Description                               |

| ---------------------- | ----------------------------------------- |

| `"NVE"`           | Constant number of particles, volume, and energy |

| `"NVT"`           | Constant number of particles, volume, and temperature |

| `"NPT"`           | Constant number of particles, pressure, and temperature |

| `"NPH"`           | Constant number of particles, pressure, and enthalpy |

results.properties.structural.radius_of_.name: label
results.properties.structural.radius_of_.description: Describes the atoms or molecule types involved in determining the property.

results.properties.structural.radius_of_.name: time_step
results.properties.structural.radius_of_.description: The timestep at which the numerical integration is performed.

results.properties.structural.radius_of_.name: ensemble_type
results.properties.structural.radius_of_.description:
The type of thermodynamic ensemble that was simulated.

Allowed values are:

| Thermodynamic Ensemble          | Description                               |

| ---------------------- | ----------------------------------------- |

| `"NVE"`           | Constant number of particles, volume, and energy |

| `"NVT"`           | Constant number of particles, volume, and temperature |

| `"NPT"`           | Constant number of particles, pressure, and temperature |

| `"NPH"`           | Constant number of particles, pressure, and enthalpy |

results.properties.dynamical.mean_square.name: type
results.properties.dynamical.mean_square.description: Describes if the correlation function is calculated at the molecular or atomic level.

results.properties.dynamical.mean_square.name: label
results.properties.dynamical.mean_square.description: Describes the group of atoms/molecule/groups of molecules involved in determining the property.

results.properties.dynamical.mean_square.name: time_step
results.properties.dynamical.mean_square.description: The timestep at which the numerical integration is performed.

results.properties.dynamical.mean_square.name: ensemble_type
results.properties.dynamical.mean_square.description:
The type of thermodynamic ensemble that was simulated.

Allowed values are:

| Thermodynamic Ensemble          | Description                               |

| ---------------------- | ----------------------------------------- |

| `"NVE"`           | Constant number of particles, volume, and energy |

| `"NVT"`           | Constant number of particles, volume, and temperature |

| `"NPT"`           | Constant number of particles, pressure, and temperature |

| `"NPH"`           | Constant number of particles, pressure, and enthalpy |

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: nperiodic_dimensions
results.properties.structures.structure_.description:
An integer specifying the number of periodic dimensions in the
structure, equivalent to the number of non-zero entries in
dimension_types.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: n_sites
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: An integer specifying the length of the cartesian_site_positions property.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: cell_volume
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Volume of the cell.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: a
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Length of the first basis vector.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: b
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Length of the second basis vector.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: c
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Length of the third basis vector.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: alpha
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Angle between second and third basis vector.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: beta
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Angle between first and third basis vector.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: gamma
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Angle between first and second basis vector.

results.properties.electronic.band_struc.name: spin_polarized
results.properties.electronic.band_struc.description:
Whether the band structure is spin-polarized, i.e. is contains channels
for both spin values.

results.properties.electronic.band_struc.name: index
results.properties.electronic.band_struc.description: Index of the data, e.g. spin channel index.

results.properties.electronic.band_struc.name: value
results.properties.electronic.band_struc.description: Band gap value. Value of zero corresponds to not having a band gap.

results.properties.electronic.dos_electr.name: spin_polarized
results.properties.electronic.dos_electr.description:
Whether the DOS is spin-polarized, i.e. is contains channels for both
spin values.

results.properties.electronic.dos_electr.name: index
results.properties.electronic.dos_electr.description: Index of the data, e.g. spin channel index.

results.properties.electronic.dos_electr.name: value
results.properties.electronic.dos_electr.description: Band gap value. Value of zero corresponds to not having a band gap.

results.properties.optoelectronic.band_g.name: index
results.properties.optoelectronic.band_g.description: Index of the data, e.g. spin channel index.

results.properties.optoelectronic.band_g.name: value
results.properties.optoelectronic.band_g.description: Band gap value. Value of zero corresponds to not having a band gap.

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: efficiency
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description: Power conversion effciency of a solar cell in percentage %.

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: fill_factor
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description: Fill factor of a solar cell in absolute values (from 0 to 1).

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: open_circuit_voltage
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description: Open circuit voltage of a solar cell.

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: short_circuit_current_density
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description: Short circuit current density of a solar cell.

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: illumination_intensity
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description: The light intensity during the IV measurement.

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: device_area
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description: The total area of the cell during IV and stability measurements under illumination.

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: device_architecture
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description:
Device architecture of the solar cell. Examples are:
`pn-Heterojunction`, `pin`, `nip`, ...

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: absorber
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description: Absorber layers used in the solar cell.

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: absorber_fabrication
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description:
Technique describing the fabrication of the absorber layer. Examples are:
`Spin-coating`, `Evaporation`, `Doctor blading`, ...

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: electron_transport_layer
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description: Electron selective contact layers used in the solar cell.

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: hole_transport_layer
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description: Hole selective contact layers used in the solar cell.

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: substrate
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description: Substrate layers used in the solar cell.

results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.name: back_contact
results.properties.optoelectronic.solar_.description: Back contact layers used in the solar cell.

results.properties.mechanical.bulk_modul.name: type
results.properties.mechanical.bulk_modul.description: Describes the methodology for obtaining the value.

results.properties.mechanical.shear_modu.name: type
results.properties.mechanical.shear_modu.description: Describes the methodology for obtaining the value.

results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.name: available_properties
results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.description: Subset of the property names that are present in this trajectory.

results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.name: time_step
results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.description: The timestep at which the numerical integration is performed.

results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.name: ensemble_type
results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.description:
The type of thermodynamic ensemble that was simulated.

Allowed values are:

| Thermodynamic Ensemble          | Description                               |

| ---------------------- | ----------------------------------------- |

| `"NVE"`           | Constant number of particles, volume, and energy |

| `"NVT"`           | Constant number of particles, volume, and temperature |

| `"NPT"`           | Constant number of particles, pressure, and temperature |

| `"NPH"`           | Constant number of particles, pressure, and enthalpy |

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: convergence_tolerance_energy_difference
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description: The input energy difference tolerance criterion.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: convergence_tolerance_force_maximum
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description: The input maximum net force tolerance criterion.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: final_force_maximum
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description: The maximum net force in the last optimization step.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: final_energy_difference
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description:
The difference in the energy_total between the last two steps during
optimization.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: final_displacement_maximum
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description: The maximum displacement in the last optimization step with respect to previous.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: nperiodic_dimensions
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description:
An integer specifying the number of periodic dimensions in the
structure, equivalent to the number of non-zero entries in
dimension_types.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: n_sites
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description: An integer specifying the length of the cartesian_site_positions property.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: a
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description: Length of the first basis vector.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: b
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description: Length of the second basis vector.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: c
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description: Length of the third basis vector.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: alpha
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description: Angle between second and third basis vector.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: beta
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description: Angle between first and third basis vector.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: gamma
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description: Angle between first and second basis vector.

results.eln.sections.name: sections
results.eln.sections.description:
The type of sections used in entries to search for. By default these are the names
of the used section definitions.

results.eln.tags.name: tags
results.eln.tags.description:
Short tags that are useful to quickly search based on various
user defined criteria.

results.eln.names.name: names
results.eln.names.description:
Short human readable and descriptive names that appear in
ELN entries.

results.eln.descriptions.name: descriptions
results.eln.descriptions.description: 'Human descriptions that appear in ELN entries.

results.eln.instruments.name: instruments
results.eln.instruments.description:
The name or type of instrument used in an activity, e.g. process or
measurement.

results.eln.methods.name: methods
results.eln.methods.description: The name or the applied method in an activity, e.g. process or measurement

results.eln.lab_ids.name: lab_ids
results.eln.lab_ids.description: The laboratory specific id for any item, e.g. sample, chemical, instrument.

results.material.name: material
results.material.description: Contains information that is specific to bulk crystalline materials.

results.material.symmetry.name: symmetry
results.material.symmetry.description:
Section containing information about the symmetry of the material. All
        of these properties are derived by running a symmetry analysis on a
        representative geometry from the original data. This original geometry
        is stored in results.properties together with the primitive and
        conventional structures.

results.material.topology.name: topology
results.material.topology.description:
Describes a a structural part that has been identified within the entry.
        May be related to other systems.

results.material.topology.atoms.species.name: species
results.material.topology.atoms.species.description:
Used to describe the species of the sites of this structure. Species can be pure chemical elements, or virtual-crystal atoms representing a statistical occupation of a
given site by multiple chemical elements.

results.material.topology.atoms.wyckoff_.name: wyckoff_sets
results.material.topology.atoms.wyckoff_.description:
Section for storing Wyckoff set information. Only available for
        conventional cells that have undergone symmetry analysis.

results.material.topology.system_relatio.name: system_relation
results.material.topology.system_relatio.description: Contains information about the relation between two different systems.

results.material.topology.symmetry.name: symmetry
results.material.topology.symmetry.description:
Section containing information about the symmetry properties of a
        conventional cell related to a system.

results.material.topology.prototype.name: prototype
results.material.topology.prototype.description: Information on the prototype corresponding to the current section.

results.method.name: method
results.method.description:
Contains a summary of the methodology that has been used in this entry.
        This methodology applies to all of the reported properties and
        determines the result of a single energy evalution. The individual
        properties may be further methodological details affect e.g. the
        sampling.

results.method.simulation.name: simulation
results.method.simulation.description: Contains method details for a simulation entry.

results.method.simulation.dft.hubbard_mo.name: hubbard_model
results.method.simulation.dft.hubbard_mo.description: Setup of the Hubbard model used in DFT+U

results.properties.name: properties
results.properties.description:
Contains the physical properties that have been calculated or used in
        this entry.

results.properties.structural.radial_dis.name: methodology
results.properties.structural.radial_dis.description:
Contains methodological information and can be attached to any physical
        property.

results.properties.structural.radius_of_.name: radius_of_gyration
results.properties.structural.radius_of_.description: Contains Radius of Gyration values as a trajectory.

results.properties.structural.radius_of_.name: methodology
results.properties.structural.radius_of_.description:
Contains methodological information and can be attached to any physical
        property.

results.properties.dynamical.mean_square.name: methodology
results.properties.dynamical.mean_square.description:
Contains methodological information and can be attached to any physical
        property.

results.properties.structures.name: structures
results.properties.structures.description:
Contains full atomistic representations of the material in different
        forms.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: structure_original
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Describes an atomistic structure.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: species
results.properties.structures.structure_.description:
Used to describe the species of the sites of this structure. Species can be pure chemical elements, or virtual-crystal atoms representing a statistical occupation of a
given site by multiple chemical elements.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: lattice_parameters
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Lattice parameters of a cell.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: wyckoff_sets
results.properties.structures.structure_.description:
Section for storing Wyckoff set information. Only available for
        conventional cells that have undergone symmetry analysis.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: structure_conventional
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Describes an atomistic structure.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: species
results.properties.structures.structure_.description:
Used to describe the species of the sites of this structure. Species can be pure chemical elements, or virtual-crystal atoms representing a statistical occupation of a
given site by multiple chemical elements.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: lattice_parameters
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Lattice parameters of a cell.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: wyckoff_sets
results.properties.structures.structure_.description:
Section for storing Wyckoff set information. Only available for
        conventional cells that have undergone symmetry analysis.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: structure_primitive
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Describes an atomistic structure.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: species
results.properties.structures.structure_.description:
Used to describe the species of the sites of this structure. Species can be pure chemical elements, or virtual-crystal atoms representing a statistical occupation of a
given site by multiple chemical elements.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: lattice_parameters
results.properties.structures.structure_.description: Lattice parameters of a cell.

results.properties.structures.structure_.name: wyckoff_sets
results.properties.structures.structure_.description:
Section for storing Wyckoff set information. Only available for
        conventional cells that have undergone symmetry analysis.

results.properties.vibrational.band_stru.name: band_structure_phonon
results.properties.vibrational.band_stru.description:
This section stores information on a vibrational band structure
        evaluation along one-dimensional pathways in the reciprocal space.

results.properties.vibrational.dos_phono.name: dos_phonon
results.properties.vibrational.dos_phono.description: Contains the total phonon density of states.

results.properties.vibrational.heat_capa.name: heat_capacity_constant_volume
results.properties.vibrational.heat_capa.description:
Contains the values of the specific (per mass) and isochoric (constant
        volume) heat capacity at different temperatures.

results.properties.vibrational.energy_fr.name: energy_free_helmholtz
results.properties.vibrational.energy_fr.description:
Contains the values of the Helmholtz free energy per atom at constant
        volume and at different temperatures.

results.properties.electronic.band_struc.name: band_structure_electronic
results.properties.electronic.band_struc.description:
This section stores information on a electonic band structure
        evaluation along one-dimensional pathways in the reciprocal space.

results.properties.electronic.band_struc.name: band_gap
results.properties.electronic.band_struc.description: Band gap information for electronic structure.

results.properties.electronic.dos_electr.name: dos_electronic
results.properties.electronic.dos_electr.description: Contains the total electronic density of states.

results.properties.electronic.dos_electr.name: band_gap
results.properties.electronic.dos_electr.description: Band gap information for electronic structure.

results.properties.mechanical.bulk_modul.name: bulk_modulus
results.properties.mechanical.bulk_modul.description: Contains bulk modulus values calculated with different methodologies.

results.properties.mechanical.shear_modu.name: shear_modulus
results.properties.mechanical.shear_modu.description: Contains shear modulus values calculated with different methodologies.

results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.name: trajectory
results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.description: Thermodynamic properties reported for an ensemble evolving in time.

results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.name: methodology
results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.description:
Contains methodological information and can be attached to any physical
        property.

results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.name: temperature
results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.description: Contains temperature values evaluated at different times.

results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.name: pressure
results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.description: Contains pressure values evaluated at different times.

results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.name: volume
results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.description: Contains volume values evaluated at different times.

results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.name: energy_potential
results.properties.thermodynamic.traject.description: Contains energy values evaluated at different times.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: species
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description:
Used to describe the species of the sites of this structure. Species can be pure chemical elements, or virtual-crystal atoms representing a statistical occupation of a
given site by multiple chemical elements.

results.properties.geometry_optimization.name: wyckoff_sets
results.properties.geometry_optimization.description:
Section for storing Wyckoff set information. Only available for
        conventional cells that have undergone symmetry analysis.
